mapper.insert: INSERT INTO "ANSWER"( INQUIRE_NUM, MEMBER_NUM, ADMIN_NUM, ANSWER_CONTENTS, ANSWER_TIME ) VALUES( #{inquireNum}, #{memberNum}, #{adminNum}, #{answerContents}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT A.INQUIRE_NUM, A.MEMBER_NUM, A.ADMIN_NUM, A.ANSWER_CONTENTS, A.ANSWER_TIME, AD.ADMIN_ID AS ADMIN_ID FROM "ANSWER" A LEFT JOIN "MEMBER" M ON A.MEMBER_NUM = M.MEMBER_NUM LEFT JOIN "ADMIN" AD ON A.ADMIN_NUM = AD.ADMIN_NUM WHERE A.INQUIRE_NUM = #{inquireNum} ORDER BY A.ANSWER_TIME DESC
SELECT m.MEMBER_ID AS answerAuthor FROM ANSWER a JOIN MEMBER m ON a.MEMBER_NUM = m.MEMBER_NUM WHERE a.INQUIRE_NUM = #{inquireNum}
